title: How much typically for beater Mathewson T206?
author: sandmountainslim

posts.post_title: How much typically for beater Mathewson T206?
posts.post_content:
What should one expect to pay for a ungraded beater T206 (dark cap) of Big Six?  

By "beater" I mean trimmed, skinned, creased etc is all ok as long as you can tell who it is. 
I am wanting to add his card to my collection before long and I want it in the grade I collect and one that won't make me eat potted meat for a week :)
[URL="http://www.ebay.com/itm/1909-11-T206-White-Border-Mathewson-Polar-Bear-Tobacco-Card-N-Y-/290656413558?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item43ac78e776"]This would seem to be a pretty good indication[/URL]
If you're looking for a presentable 1,  I'd expect to pay 150-200.
